text:
Dr. C. Walter Stone, Pafe 2, September 21, 1959
If, following these meetings and preliminary steps, the project in
any way does not live up to promise, we shall not hesitate to
recommend the cancellation of the contract. We hope, however,
that this will not be necessary.
Further details on this project will be available and will be
forwarded shortly after October 1, as stated. However I did not
want to miss the October 1 deadline for this report.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skoraia
Executive Director
HJSiJO/dp
cct Dr. Marshall McLuhan
Dr. Sam Becker
Mr. William Harley
Dr. John Schwarzwalder
Mr. Jack McBride
